topic.title: Teams
topic.p: You can create teams in an organization to work with dedicated projects. Here are some basic advantages of using teams:

list.li: You can combine several projects under a single team to provide a convenient way for navigation.
You can share specific projects among %product_cloud% users that are part of your organization.

topic.p: To create a team, on the organization page click Create team. This will open the New team dialog window to specify the team name.
After creating, you can access the team from the left sidebar of the %product_cloud% UI. Based on the existing team, you can create new projects associated with it.
To manage team members, click the upper-right corner of the team and select Invite members. If you wish to delete (archive) the team, click Archive team.
